meanings.definition: A person or group that starts a new trend or style.
meanings.sent1: The trendsetters in school always wore colorful clothes.
meanings.sent2: Fashion trendsetters often inspire others with their unique outfits.
meanings.sent3: The trendsetters at the party had everyone admiring their cool outfits.
meanings.sent4: She was a trendsetter in the way she mixed and matched different styles.
meanings.sent5: The trendsetters' influence on fashion was undeniable.

meanings.definition: The act of setting a trend or influencing others.
meanings.sent1: Her trendsetters in fashion design were always ahead of the curve.
meanings.sent2: The trendsetters of the music industry often introduce new sounds.
meanings.sent3: The trendsetters in technology made everyone want the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent4: Their innovative ideas were trendsetters in the business world.
meanings.sent5: The trendsetters' impact on society was profound.
